Benji Wallis
About Hobbys My Future

At 30 years old, while I am still figuring things out, I believe I want to live in Tauranga and work as a theatre technician. The idea of being a part of the performing arts and contributing to live productions as a theatre technician is both intriguing and exciting to me. However, this is a big decision, and I may change my mind. Regardless, I will continue to explore my interests and goals and make the best decisions for myself. If the path leads me to Tauranga and the theatre, I am excited for the opportunities and experiences that await. But, if I end up pursuing something else, I am open to new possibilities. In short, I am unsure about my future at 30 years old, but I believe I want to live in Tauranga and work as a theatre technician.
